help-file.title: WEAPONS WEAPONRY
help-file.content:
The weapons of Duris fall into several main types, and you should practice at each to become proficient. Ability to hit with a given weapon is improved by your proficiency with that weapon's type. Certain character classes are prohibited from using certain weapon types. Below is a list of all types of weapons currently available:
1-handed bludgeon 1-handed slashing 1-handed piercing 1-handed flaying 2-handed bludgeon 2-handed slashing 2-handed flaying
